We launched today a new project to transform Dubai into a smart city where the city is managed, education, healthcare and public security through intelligent systems
The new project will provide high-speed Internet access in public areas for all residents of Dubai and provide them with live information and services
The Smart City project will include sensors distributed throughout Dubai to serve the population better and improve the quality of life for all
The management of cities today needs new tools .. And a different thought .. We want to create a new reality for our people .. A different life for our children .. A new global model in development
Our vision evolves and the rules of development change to adapt to a new scientific reality. Experience has taught us that there is no permanent model in development.
Celebrating with the @AllBlacks after their fantastic 41-33 win over Australia in Dunedin tonight. http://t.co/99rNRTSgdj

The link between all those assassinated is their association with the state, and the link between the perpetrators of these assassinations is striking national unity, the criminal must not escape punishment
Major General Al Hassan succeeded with other intelligence agencies in weaving a safety net for Lebanese citizens
Suleiman continued the steps to end the case of the perpetrators of the Azzaz, stressing the necessary measures to accelerate the process of their arrival in Lebanon and return to their families
We launched a new project to transform Dubai into a smart city. Education, healthcare and general security will be managed via smart systems
The project aims to provide all Dubai residents with high speed internet in public places and live services and information
The dubai smart city project involves remote sensor devices all over Dubai to provide better lifestyle and services to Dubai residents
Creating an international city model and a new bettered reality for our people is our purpose
Our vision, thoughts, means and development bases are in a constant change to fulfill this purpose
